website_summaries.verdict: A large, lighted inspection mirror that enables you to cover a lot of ground quickly.
pros: Mirror does not flop around or change position
cons: Some have said that the light shines in your eyes, making it difficult to use

customer_reviews.title: Lights - seemed like good idea, but aren't
customer_reviews.text: Built-in LED lights seemed light a good idea but most of the time they blind me and I can't see what I need to see. If I turn them off I have a serviceable mirror that is thicker than it needs to be (due to lights and batteries), therefore won't fit in tight spaces as easily as it otherwise could. But I'm glad to have the mirror overall.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT for viewing under the foot
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT for viewing under the foot, as all Diabetics should be doing, and the light source is also excellent and actually lets you visualize what you are trying to look at. It extends well and also STAYS where you put it, doesn't try to creep up or down, even when resting it against the floor. I use it for personal use, but I can see where mechanics and carpenters could benefit from it as well. Good quality craftsmanship too !
customer_reviews.author: Ellis B. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Light placement is a problem, but it can be fixed.
customer_reviews.text: I have the same complaint as a couple of other reviews. The lights shines directly in your eyes making it impossible to use. I taped a couple of aluminum foil reflectors on it and the problem was largely solved. It's too bad it wasn't built that way.
customer_reviews.author: John in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard to reach areas- awesome for wound care!
customer_reviews.text: I had a major surgery and actually bought this to see places I couldn't see otherwise for wound care. This was invaluable to me during my recovery! I was able to effectively see everything--- for those who left reviews saying the light restricts what you can see... I didn't experience that. Just tilting the mirror more corrected that issue. The light was perfect and really helped when a regular large handheld mirror and overhead lights just didn't do the trick. This mirror has a great ability to reach all kinds of angles by tilting it or extending the arm to increase the length. I love the versatility of this and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to use
customer_reviews.text: The light being so bright it is hard to get a good angle on the mirror to see the underside of ones foot. You have to block the light from your eyes with your foot so the light does not shine in your eyes but still illuminates the bottom of your foot. It needed a dial to allow the modulation of the light brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic F

customer_reviews.title: great but lights are kind of  blinding
customer_reviews.text: good but this i guess is an inherent problem with the product but the mirror hard to use with the led lights because the lights blind you when you look at the mirror. when you look at the mirror with the lights on you are staring right into the lights. they need some type of shade or something clever.
customer_reviews.author: JR Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great for finding dropped bolts when working on the truck
customer_reviews.text: This product did recently save me when I dropped a bolt while working on my truck. I use magnetic reach tools but after they failed to retrieve anything, i was able to use this eventually located and retrieve the bolt which has dropped into a hidden location . I really like the two led lights and the adjustable angle and extension length. It’s a good tool which when handled carefully should last a long time. Giving it five star because it already paid for itself in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Savage

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC TOOL! Take it from me
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC TOOL! Take it from me! Every household should not be without one of these little inspection lighted mirrors! My wife thought it was a make-up mirror for tall women??? Anyway this is definitely a 5 Star shopping experience! Larry Marshall Meadows
customer_reviews.author: Larry Marshall Meadors

customer_reviews.title: You may want a lighted periscope instead.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely nothing wrong with the product besides my own shortsightedness. This mirror is only good if you can see the mirror when you’re using it (eg perfect for looking at the bottoms of your feet, but you most often will need a second mirror with it, as when you want to look at something on your back.) Similar to when you need to look at the back of your hair. You cannot use it to see what toys your grandchild has pushed under the couch unless you can get down and see the mirror, in which case you don’t really need the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Batteries already in.  Nice and bright lights.
customer_reviews.text: LED lights are very bright. Nice sturdy product. Couldn't find the batteries at first but learned from the seller that they were in the mirror already as they checked it to be sure it was working. There were molds in the packaging for the batteries so I hadn't checked the battery compartment in the mirror. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: Good for diabetics to check their feet! Dad approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad after a little wellness visit found a sore ob the bottom of his foot he was not aware of. In diabetes management it is super important to check your feet daily for any wounds as decreased sensation may be masking a serious problem. This mirror is perfect because it telescopes, lights up, and magnifies to allow for improved visuals. Apparently it also works on cars too. So there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyJo

customer_reviews.title: great product, works as described
customer_reviews.text: I am a plumber and I use(d) this mirror to inspect the nonvisible part of solder joints in tight spaces. The light assisted mirror allowed me to see clearly where I couldn’t see without a mirror, and the light works well. It could certainly be used for many other tasks. It is slightly large, which is helpful in most situations due to the large viewing surface, but could be detrimental in very very tight spaces. Great product, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crehan

customer_reviews.title: Works! Bright light, tilts as adjusted
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mirror to look at my toddler's butt while he sits on the toilet (he has a soiling problem). I thought, surely there is a mirror with light that you can tilt to see around corners. And, there it is on Amazon! The light is bright but doesn't obscure vision if you angle it such that the light part is covered but the mirror isn't to your eyes. Now I can see very clearly to wash kid's butt with spray. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Puppy's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly not a cheap feel to the telescope or the light on the mirror... Its not too bright or dim and the light lasts long enough on its batteries to get you thru plenty of extended uses. The telescope doesnt slip so it will hold the mirror whatever angle you tilt it. The only issue is occasionally having to tighten the joint at the mirror but any brand of this style mirror needs that unless they are cheap riveted mirrors and those kind just get tossed..
customer_reviews.author: crazytekkieTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It is bright enough to be useful and he has not had the issues that some ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who is a plumber. He works in many tight spaces where he needs to see around a corner or back into an area he can't physically reach. He has found this light to be very helpful. It is bright enough to be useful and he has not had the issues that some reviewers referred to re: the light shining in his eyes. The length is great for his purposes. The tool is well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Choose Joy

customer_reviews.title: Handy Device To Have Around the House or Shop
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great for peering into small dark places, such as your mouth or other small dark crevices. Small (bright) built-in Flashlight helps illuminate the area of interest. Cons: Mirror will quickly fog up if there is a significant atmospheric variant; however a small dab of Antifog solution (or Alcohol) will solve the problem temporarily, so that you can view the mirror image(s) without distortion.
customer_reviews.author: beenaroundtheblock

customer_reviews.title: Good sized mirror but WAY TOO BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good sized mirror and is attached to a relatively robust telescoping wand. Unfortunately, in most practical cases, the LEDs point raigh back in your eyes. The LEDs are very bright - enough to blind you when trying to observe whatever it is you're looking for. A good idea with a faulty implementation.
customer_reviews.author: Treibs

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: I put a small piece of green masking tape over half of the light to cut back the glare. I needed to remove a mouse from the bottom of my heater and inserted the mirror through the filter slot. Very narrow space but he enabled me to find and remove the mouse with double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: John Armbruster

customer_reviews.title: Light the way
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little light for the price. It's not solidly-built but it's built good enough to last a while. My only complaint is that the angle of the light can sometimes make it difficult to see which is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. But in general it does what I wanted It to. Great for spotting oil leaks on the back of your engine.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Larger.......
customer_reviews.text: Larger would be better. While the unit was as described, and seems well made, my goal for the purchase was to be able to see if an item was under a piece of furniture. My dog likes to chase his toys, sometimes under the sofa. As I get older, it is not as much fun to get on my knees to see what is under the furniture. I am not able to make that determination with this unit. The viewing surface needs to be larger.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: mmm.
customer_reviews.text: if you have impeccable eyesight this is for you. if you are not superman it is soo hard to see things. the telescopic pole does not mean you can see ANYTHING in the mirror. very disappointing and took a little long for delivery.
customer_reviews.author: blainevonharden

customer_reviews.title: Great for the tradesmen
customer_reviews.text: I’m a plumber and always use this item to check my joints. Makes my job easier and is very sturdy. I’m not saying this is water proof or rugged but I’ve dropped it from ladders, thrown it in tools box, got it wet too many times to count and the lights are still working . We’ll definitely buy another when I need to replace it👍
customer_reviews.author: Tito

customer_reviews.title: Good Mirror, Mixed Results with Lights
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality, but not great. The LED lights are right on the mirror end, meaning you are staring into a bright light trying to see the mirror in the reflection. Takes very careful use to block the LEDs from your eyes, so the lights are of dubious utility.
customer_reviews.author: BucksofSteel

customer_reviews.title: This is not a quality product. It will not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a quality product. It will not last long. The light is bright but the handle is very thin metal and the telescoping function is rough when you pull it out and push it back in. It's only a matter of time before you bend it and it's the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For Anyone Diabetic
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered for my wife’s brother. He is diabetic and needs to keep a eye on the bottom of his feet. Due to previous knee and hip surgery he can’t bend his knees far enough to allow him to look at the bottom of his feet. He now uses this product and is very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: George A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Utterly worthless. 1. The LEDs shine directly into your eyes. 2. They are bright enough to blind you, but if you somehow manage to shade them, they're not bright enough to see beyond 6" (150mm) if that. If I hadn't thrown the packaging away, I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Feinstein

customer_reviews.title: It works great and is prefect for searching under and behind things ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great and is prefect for searching under and behind things for lost keys, etc. The lights are a little bright, so I wish there was a Bright/Dim switch on it. The bright lights do help when looking a good distance with this. The handle is strong and the mirror does not flop around at all. A very good purchase. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lighting placement not quite right for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Unit appears sturdy and well built. Shipping was fast. Is a good device and I continue to use it. If lighting were further apart or moved down lower on the mirror it would be much better for my inspection needs. It is a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Busby

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Super bright, so super bright you cannot use it with the light on. Blinds you know matter the angel and when fully stretched it's very hard to see the small mirror
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Small mirror
customer_reviews.text: It gives the size in the description so I'm not sure why I was surprised as to the small size: 21⁄2 x 2 inches; looks simple -made in China; the screw on the back panel might be a problem- not sure how long the battery will last. I was looking primarily for a telescoping mirror so I would not have to get up on a ladder and for that it worked-keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: MurftheSurf

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Mirror, Blinding Light
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, bright light, but poor design. Tried to use this to inspect the bottoms of my feet, but the mirror was too small to see anything well, and the positioning of the lights was blinding as I was trying to see in the mirror. Sturdy construction, but design renders it useless.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Works great, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great extension mirror, the built in light is very helpful and prevents having to aim a flashlight in one hand and position the mirror in the other. LED’s helps the batteries last a long time and not have to worry about bulbs burning out.
customer_reviews.author: greg jourdonais

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mirror to use in hard to get to spots. It is very well made and very sturdy. It will last for years to come as long as it is taken care of. Great extension mirror!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony fish

customer_reviews.title: Light the Way!
customer_reviews.text: This inspection mirror allows me to check the underside of a quilt I am quilting on a frame. The light is bright and the mirror can angle in any direction. My only surprise was how small the mirror is, but it still functions well for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Great for folks with feet neuropathy and diabetic feet issues as well!
customer_reviews.text: Folks that have difficulty with neuropathy of their extremities, especially bottom of their feet, need to view them frequently. Actually, a physical therapist friend of mine found this device on Amazon, and brought it to my attention for a family member. It works great - the telescoping length, and the lighted mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl  BlackBerry

customer_reviews.title: glare from lights makes it impossible to see.
customer_reviews.text: The placement of the lights causes glare to be reflected into the users eyes. The lights need to be placed on the handle side and shine towards the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE MEZEI

customer_reviews.title: Needs a strap or a case if your inspecting welds on a building
customer_reviews.text: This is my best friend when inspecting welds. Just needs a tether or something to help protect the mirror when moving around on the iron. Broke one because it was in my bolt bags. Dropped another because it was folded over chest strap and fell as I was looking at welds hanging off the iron.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to help with an HID headlight replacement in an impossible location. I was able to actually see the light bulb instead of working completely by feel. It was perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Connecticut Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trucker Approved.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for a trucker friend and he absolutely loves it. Uses it every day. Says it is super bright and says it makes a huge difference in doing g his daily truck inspections.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well and he was pleased (as was I since the tub got fixed)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband to use in trying to locate a leak in the pipe of our bathtub. Worked very well and he was pleased (as was I since the tub got fixed).
customer_reviews.author: Granny 3

customer_reviews.title: Great BUT...
customer_reviews.text: It's great. I use it for work I been having it for a few months but I notice where the mirror and stick mean is becoming loose.(the only season it's getting 4 stars) I hope it doesn't break in me. I would still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for guitar inspection
customer_reviews.text: I';m using this to inspect inside guitars. It works very well for that, however as others have mentioned, the lights tend to shine right in your eyes making it harder to see. Should be easy to modify though and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Crackers

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: The mirror came with batteries installed and ready to go, right out of the box. Eliminates the need to hold a mirror and a flashlight simultameously. I needed this tool because I couldn't see the front of my dashcam to determine if it was functioning or not but there are a thousand uses I could think of. This mirror does the job and I'm happy. The lights are very bright. The handle has a nice rubber grip. A very good tool and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Dana A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: light shined in my eyes
customer_reviews.text: Very bright light, nice extension and maneuvarbility. For some reason, I had a hard time using it though because the lights shined in my eyes as I tried to see around the corner with the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES S.

customer_reviews.title: good build quality, could be brighter
customer_reviews.text: This product has a good build quality. It is not bright enough for my 64 year old eyes so I use it with the flashlight. Fully extended it is not floppy---very well built. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Senn

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Broke first time used it. Bent the mirror to I different angle and it snapped off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: versatile, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I found this very handy. It has several telescoping sections for extended reach, the mirror articulates to multiple positions, and the LED light is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: md74

customer_reviews.title: very bright light easy to maneuver into place
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback I came up with is when in certain situations the light section will shine directly back at me when I get the mirrored position I need to see the area I need to work on.
customer_reviews.author: shrifty

customer_reviews.title: ... stars because "it's okay" While the product itself is good, the mirror is too small for looking underneath ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating the product 3 stars because "it's okay" While the product itself is good, the mirror is too small for looking underneath my truck. I have a large enough mirror that I can glue on top of this one so as to not make this purchase a complete lost.
customer_reviews.author: ANIBAL RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Blinding
customer_reviews.text: As indicated in many reviews, this is a good mirror with blinding lights and a very functional adjustable handle. The LEDs are nice and bright, but they shine in your eyes instead of on the work you are trying to see.
customer_reviews.author: LARichard

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Worked much better than my harbor freight one that got a weird mark right in the middle of it. I used this on a Subaru timing belt job. It really helped me line up the hard to see marks!
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Blinding
customer_reviews.text: Too bright at some angles. You get blinded while you are looking into mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Led light
customer_reviews.text: I use this wonderful LED light to look under my quilt as I'm sewing on my long arm. It's nice and bright and can be extended for further viewing. A must-have for quilters.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have around
customer_reviews.text: Using the mirror I was able to locate the leak under the dishwasher so I knew what parts needed to be ordered before disconnecting it and pulling it out.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Haselwood

customer_reviews.title: Lights on mirror help you see what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror so my wife could check her bluebird houses for eggs and hatched chicks. Works great. The lights really helped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice & sturdy, very bright too
customer_reviews.text: I've had several different telescoping mirrors similar to this in the past and every one has ended up useless due to a broken mirror, this one is well protected in its plastic housing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper--
customer_reviews.text: Yes--the lights do interfere with viewing, but you just have to tilt the mirror off what you're looking at. This little mirror does work well, and it's a lot cheaper than some extendable mirrors made for disabled people.
customer_reviews.author: E'Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! I'm a short older person that has a hard time reaching and bending. This is great both in the house and out. I love being able from the ground to use the mirror to look in the gutters and be sure they are clear. It also works great for things that fall and roll out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: BELLA MIA

customer_reviews.title: lights not placed right
customer_reviews.text: the two LED lights shine right into your eyes when you try to look in the mirror which defeats the purpose of having it light up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this handy light!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this for many things around the house and loves it! He originally wanted it to see behind the large tv for booking up cables, but uses it often for other DIY projects
customer_reviews.author: JammieJo

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Only gave it the stars because of the idea how it’s supposed to work. Broke within first hour as the mirror popped off the extension piece and wont go back on. A little to flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Joelc79

customer_reviews.title: This is well made
customer_reviews.text: The size is just right. I work with individuals that have developmental and physical disabilities and this works well for hygiene issues.
customer_reviews.author: D. Giles

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice telescoping feature, holds position, light it just bright enough, very handy when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Luterek

customer_reviews.title: It works well but...
customer_reviews.text: they are really over priced. I paid 11.99 for one then found the exact same thing at the local discount store for $4.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive tool gets the job done!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a mirror on a stick. Except, it also has a light. Pretty great little tool when trying to look on top of, behind, or beneath something...
customer_reviews.author: Jon Santamont

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Gets around the corner everywhere on our boat ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Sturdy. Gets around the corner everywhere on our boat where for some reason everything is tucked out of sight and difficult to access. Good tool for the tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Drez

customer_reviews.title: this is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I can see what my stitches look like under my quilt what looks like under my quilt and see that the stitches are ok
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Extended mirror, LED batteries dead.
customer_reviews.text: Led light worked for first couple days, but the switch failed to turn the light off. Batteries are now dead. I use a flashlight to reflect off mirror to see where I’m looking.
customer_reviews.author: radarbandit

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Was not sure if it was large enough, but it sure is..Great product..
customer_reviews.author: Thomas King

customer_reviews.title: A good mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and does the job but I give three stars due to the build of the tool. You must be very careful to keep it from falling apart. It feels like the handle would break in a strong wind. Way over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J

customer_reviews.title: Extends further than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a broken, non -lighted mirror. This was a good choice!
customer_reviews.author: Mario M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Auto Mechanics
customer_reviews.text: great product, great price and value; I use it for auto repairs in hard to see places like under the dash or other hard to see places. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: jscrenci

customer_reviews.title: The light shines in your eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I found this mirror very difficult to use. The light shines in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: DMP

customer_reviews.title: Good - Narrow field of view and bright light
customer_reviews.text: Very good - narrow mirror and light is bright (which is good and bad depending on angle)
customer_reviews.author: Jochi

customer_reviews.title: Very good inspection mirror.
customer_reviews.text: This inspection mirror works perfectly. The lights work well. But please remember to turn the switch off when you're done, otherwise your battery will die.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for your toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool! Can be used either with or without the light on. Like the Dremel tool, you don't know you need this tool until you need this tool. Very handy and a great bargain
customer_reviews.author: billwest

customer_reviews.title: Did the job.
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly how its supposed to . Lights are bright . Seems durable
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product priced right
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Used to look around a corner in a dryer vent that was plugged.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: The built in light is a great idea!
customer_reviews.text: I've had inspections mirrors and using them with a flashlight in the other hand was a pain. The bright light built in to this one makes it a better and easier to use design.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good for small projects
customer_reviews.text: Good for small close projects. Standard mirror (doesn't magnify). It has limited uses but when it can be used it's well worth its cost.
customer_reviews.author: A. Eric Brewington

customer_reviews.title: good mirror
customer_reviews.text: I received this in a timely manner. Excellent condition. I can with this very clearly
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to look underneath your car
customer_reviews.text: I was able to spot a leak in my wife's car and was able to fix it. Very useful thing to have in your garage.
customer_reviews.author: G Man

customer_reviews.title: Nice & value
customer_reviews.text: Has really long extension which I like. The two LED's are bright and need to be careful about placement so does not shine in eyes.
customer_reviews.author: 19d60

customer_reviews.title: Short mans helper
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to do. My wall furnace, to be safe, is slightly higher than where I can see the thermostat control on top. This provides me a means to see and adjust temp as needed
customer_reviews.author: REAL BLUES

customer_reviews.title: I can better than a submarine in the sea.
customer_reviews.text: With this device I can see new hair growing on my bald head. I can peek around corners to see if my ex wife may be coming with a gun. I can hunt for new areas to shave. It's a miracle of modern science. Kirk Arnett.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Clear mirror and long telescoping handle. Light is fair but LED.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Putman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Early
customer_reviews.text: Works great except that the lights on the end of the mirror shine in my eyes when I try to look into the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bee

customer_reviews.title: Light is bright..
customer_reviews.text: It does what it’s supposed to as a mirror but the light glaring back almost inhibits the subject
customer_reviews.author: Atxdj

customer_reviews.title: Mirror is small
customer_reviews.text: Not a great inspection tool. Mirror is small. If you want to inspect little far areas, you won’t see mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You might not know it, but you need this
customer_reviews.text: Our new favorite tool!!! I'd buy again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A.

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my brother in law who can no longer bend down to see under his RV. He loves it and commented about how bright the light is.
customer_reviews.author: Allareone

customer_reviews.title: Small mirror so limited function for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I could not find a larger mirror so this was the best I could find
customer_reviews.author: Greg H

customer_reviews.title: Light in your eyes
customer_reviews.text: Works--light is not adjustable, tilt nor brightness--will shine in your eyes when looking at mirror--did not realize this was a "needed" requirement prior to ordering--at times cannot move mirror to avoid the 'light in your eyes'
customer_reviews.author: MNBased

customer_reviews.title: Great item for Mechanics or Skilled Laborists
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father for Christmas and he seems to love it! Must get for a mechanic or anyone that does any kind of skilled labor.
customer_reviews.author: Keagan

customer_reviews.title: ... is actually smaller than I expected but it works fine. It arrived as promised
customer_reviews.text: This is actually smaller than I expected but it works fine. It arrived as promised. It is a handy little tool.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L.

customer_reviews.title: But the mirror works good, would I buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Lights quit working after a short period of time , But the mirror works good ,would I buy it again NO
customer_reviews.author: Beast

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my diabetic dad
customer_reviews.text: Dad lost one leg and can't feel his other foot. This is perfect for him to visibly inspect his foot twice daily! High quality, too!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Does what it claims to do. And now I am able to verify that my resident hummingbird has laid only one egg.
customer_reviews.author: rbgilbert

customer_reviews.title: Nifty tool.
customer_reviews.text: When your head won't fit. This is your only hope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after I got it out of the package. The light is bright but hard to use when looking at indicator inside machine.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Temple

product_meta.title: Telescoping LED Lighted Flexible Inspection Mirror 360 Swivel for Extra Viewing
product_meta.description:
The Inspection Mirror allows you to peer into the dark crevices of your work space in search of leaks, breaks or lost tools.eg:under vehicle and so on

Twin LED lights illuminate hidden areas for ultimate visibility.
feature_bullets: Rectangular Mirror Size:2.5"*1.7" Extended Length: 34" Collapsed Length: 7.5"
Telescoping mirror has 2 extra bright LED lights facilitate the inspection of hard-to-see and hard-to reach areas
Not only is the mirror telescoping and lighted, it also features a 360 degree swivel double ball joint for extra viewing capabilities
Inspection mirror comes with two CR2032 batteries, Comfortable molded poly handle with soft, nonslip rubber grip
Inspection mirrors are ideal for toolmakers, machinists, inspectors and mechanics; lights make it especially useful for dark and hard to see places

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
